name: waaconnector
description: More flexible audio node connections and disconnections.

scripts.build: browserify index.js > dist/latest-build.js; browserify index.js > test/latest-build.js
scripts.build.tests: node node_modules/waatest/bin/scaffold waatest; browserify index.js > waatest/lib-build.js ; browserify test/index.js > waatest/test-build.js
